pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Pencom PackagePackage to control Pencom serial relay boards through an Ethernet adaptorusing Python.# Example: from time import sleep from pencompy import pencompy hub = pencompy( 'host.test.com', 4008 ) # Turn the first relay on hub.set( 0, 0, True ) # Pause for a second sleep(1.) # Turn the first relay off hub.set( 0, 0, False ) # Close the interface hub.close()
